roleset.name: to outdo, get the better of
roleset.note: TRUMP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'trump' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from trump.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [*-2] Asked [*-1]whether Friday 's action could help him avoid [*-3]-4 being Trumped [*-4] by the New York real estate magnate , Mr. Crandall smiled broadly and said : `` No comment . ''
example.arg: by the New York real estate magnate
